About LUFA

Future Changes

Below is a list of future changes which are proposed for the LUFA library, but not yet started/complete. This gives an unordered list of future changes which will be available in future releases of the library. If you have an item to add to this list, please contact the library author via email, the LUFA mailing list, or post your suggestion as an enhancement request to the project bug tracker.

Targeted for the Next Release (SVN Development Only):

Targeted for Future Releases:

  • Code Features
    1. Add hub support when in Host mode for multiple devices
    2. Add ability to get number of bytes not written with pipe/endpoint write routines after an error
    3. Add standardized descriptor names to class driver structures
    4. Add RNDIS Host Class driver
    5. Correct mishandling of error cases in Mass Storage demos
  • Documentation/Support
    1. Remake AVRStudio project files
    2. Add detailed overviews of how each demo works
    3. Master LUFA include file rather than per-module includes
    4. Change makefiles to allow for absolute LUFA location to be used
    5. Add board overviews
    6. Write LUFA tutorials
  • Demos/Projects
    1. Keyboard/Mouse Dual Class Host
    2. Multiple-Report HID device
    3. Device/Host bridge
  • Ports
    1. AVR32 UC3B series microcontrollers
    2. Atmel ARM7 series microcontrollers
    3. Other (commercial) C compilers
Generated on 1 Dec 2009 for LUFA (Formerly MyUSB) Library by  1.6.1
